description: Creates a traffic policy, which you use to create multiple DNS resource record sets for one domain name (such as example.com) or one subdomain name (such as www.example.com).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the traffic policy.

parameters.name: Document
parameters.description: The definition of this traffic policy in JSON format. For more information, see Traffic Policy Document Format.

nested_items.name: TrafficPolicy
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains settings for the new traffic policy.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID that Amazon Route 53 assigned to a traffic policy when you created it.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version number that Amazon Route 53 assigns to a traffic policy. For a new traffic policy, the value of Version is always 1.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name that you specified when you created the traffic policy.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The DNS type of the resource record sets that Amazon Route 53 creates when you use a traffic policy to create a traffic policy instance.

nested_items.name: Document
nested_items.description: The definition of a traffic policy in JSON format. You specify the JSON document to use for a new traffic policy in the CreateTrafficPolicy request. For more information about the JSON format, see Traffic Policy Document Format.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: The comment that you specify in the CreateTrafficPolicy request, if any.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: A unique URL that represents a new traffic policy.
